meanings.definition: To wait until the end of a period of time.
meanings.sent1: She was outwaiting the clock to strike midnight.
meanings.sent2: The students were outwaiting the bell to signal the end of the school day.
meanings.sent3: The cat was outwaiting the mouse to make a move.
meanings.sent4: The detective was outwaiting the suspect to reveal the truth.
meanings.sent5: The flower was outwaiting the sun to bloom.

meanings.definition: To wait patiently for something to happen.
meanings.sent1: He was outwaiting for his turn in line at the amusement park.
meanings.sent2: The dog was outwaiting for its owner to return home.
meanings.sent3: The child was outwaiting for the ice cream truck to arrive.
meanings.sent4: The farmer was outwaiting for the crops to grow.
meanings.sent5: The artist was outwaiting for inspiration to strike.
